website_summaries.verdict: This made in the USA vest is an Amazon best seller.
pros: Specifically designed for various modular attachments.Comes in sizes M - XL and can be adjusted
Shoulder can be adjusted and has side release buckles
Uses hook and loop guides and webbing
Front pocket for maps or documents with a snap closure
cons: This vest didn't fit as tightly as some customers wanted it to

customer_reviews.title: Fits big guys!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy 6’4” and 450 lbs was worried this would not fit me. I gave it a chance and ordered it. It does fit barely but it does fit. So if you are a bigger guy this vest fits. Material and craftsmanship is great! I am ordering a second one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Usmchmx1

customer_reviews.title: I support 110%
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that I found a company with great product. When my vest arrived, I tried it on and it fit perfect on me. I’m a police officer and it goes great with what I do. I will most definitely tell me co-workers where to get their vest from. Thank you all for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey BrownLow

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tactical vest
customer_reviews.text: I am a super fan of GLORYFIRE products. This tactical vest is what I've wanted to buy. To my annoyance, they seems to have changed its brand name and title to GFIRE. It took me a long time to find it. To me, really pleased with this purchase. The vest arrived in great condition. Everything fits and easily adjustable. Besides, this tactical vest is really well designed. And I've installed one triple mag pouch, 2 mag Pouches, one storage pouch. It didn't make me feel bloated. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: chao sok

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the vest completely adjustable and fits comfortably. The Velcro, nylon material and stitching is extremely strong. I can barely spectate the Velcro with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: jason money

customer_reviews.title: Great Plate Carrier
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice plate carrier. Has no problem supporting a lot of weight and works exactly how I wanted it to. It rides very comfortably with plates in the front and back. I added quick releases to it because it can be a pain to get on and off without them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Great for the job or the gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for functional fitness training, but I'm thinking of getting a second one for armour plates. If your a big guy...or gal this is a good fit, easy to adjust, all that you'd want in a tactical situation or as workout equipment and includes a cummerbund makes this a good value. As for the drag handle, I'm not 100% convinced it will hold up, but the shoulder straps will. I recommend this vest nonmatter the application.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Martin

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is really of good quality, and has enough pouches and compartments I need. The adjustable straps at the shoulders and the waist area can help me fit my body well, actually it can fit for just about anybody. All in all, this is a well-made product, fits from small to large people, a lot of pouches, holsters, compartments. I recommend this highly to anyone who’s looking for a tactical style vest.
customer_reviews.author: Demi Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, good for real plates
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price with high quality finish. I run AR500 plates in mine and they fit like a charm / the best holds up great. This works well for a SHTF vest or, as another reviewer notes, a duty vest. 10/10 would buy again. I'm glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Paul I.

customer_reviews.title: Stitches ripping out
customer_reviews.text: Over all poor execution I was hoping this would similar to the condor MOPC but it's not it's just very low quality airsoft junk. Thankfuly Amazon has an awesome return policy. Stitches started coming don in the rear where the cummerbund passes through the rear plate holder.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Krause

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly large!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is incredibly large! I had to tighten the shoulder straps as tight as they can go with leaving as little Velcro as possible to get the fitment right where my plates need to be. See photo for details. The green strap you see if how much I had to pull to get the front and rear to sit properly to protect vitals. (If it’s any lower you’re wearing it wrong) Overall it’s a great vest for starters. The Velcro admin pouch is great, cummerbund is great as well. I’ve had it for about a year now and haven’t taken it to a range yet for run and gun because of Corona.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good vest, not what is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Going against my better judgement, I ordered this even though when I asked if the product people got was the same as what is in the ad’s photos they said yes. It is definitely not. I knew worst case, it is still worth the money... I just like to get what I am being promoted if I decide to buy. Look at customer photos and that is 100% the vest you are getting. Not the ones in the ad. That being said, I am not disappointed for spending around 60 bucks for what I got. It seems and feels durable, it is fairly comfortable, molle is strong and firm, velcro holds tight.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Jurgonski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in a lot of ways
customer_reviews.text: Awesome plate carrier it does fit on the more medium to large side. I’m 5’5” 130 and it is a tad big. I did purchase foam inserts and it fit and felt 100 times better. As it is so soft and comfortable when loaded up you need the plates unless you are larger and can get it nice and snug in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Tan carrier. I got a carrier that had parts I would say are tan. The majority of it looked like it was dyed with used water from a batch of OD green because it wasn't really tan... But also wasn't really OD green. Also the design is weird. They got buttons it looked like instead of hook and loop to secure plates or something. Once I opened it I didn't bother wasting my time installing my plates to see what it fit like. Moving on.
customer_reviews.author: John Words

customer_reviews.title: Broken latch
customer_reviews.text: one of the plastic shoulder snaps was broken, also help me please
customer_reviews.author: Amazon2

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Made pretty well. My plates fit fine. It’s decent enough. I was thinking it would be cheaply made but I was shocked. It’s sturdy. Made well n comfy not fake feeling or look...,
customer_reviews.author: ΜΟΛΩΝ ΛΑΒΕ

customer_reviews.title: I dig this vest. 🤙
customer_reviews.text: This vest is really cool, personally I’ve had it for a little over a month now, I really like that it brings a new level of intensity to my workouts. HOWEVER! It does not come with plates, I personally got my weighted plates from Rouge. That’s on me though. I really enjoy this vest. I dig the MOLLE straps and the shoulder straps.. this things sick.
customer_reviews.author: Andrevedere

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for training purposes. So far I have run with it around 15 miles in 8 days and it feels comfortable and seems durable. Since it has pockets I like to use the for carrying a small folding knife, my cel and an ID. I fit inside some Hardox 500 plates that weight aprox 10lbs each. The vest comes with inside straps for securing the plates so they aren’t moving when you are running. I’m 5’ 7” tall and weight around 194lbs and it fits just right so if you are smaller keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: R. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit under 225lbs.
customer_reviews.text: I am 6’ tall and 190 lbs with a low body fat. This waist band has nowhere near the adjustability to be used by my body type. Clearly built for very high body fat people. Luckily it is easier to take in than out. I will simply take it to an upholstery shop and have it modified to fit me. Should still come out cheaper than the next step up. The side buckles are not really accessible or tight enough so I plan to relocate them to an accessible location as well. I do otherwise really like it... I wanted side plates and mounting so I will deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mickala Sottek

customer_reviews.title: Not garbage, actually solid. 👍
customer_reviews.text: I don't advocate for using amazon to buy firearm or armor related stuff, that being said the carrier holds up to the weight of even ar500 steel plates. I was fully expecting the structure of the carrier to implode when I dropped my level lll inserts into it. But surprisingly it supported itself fine. I haven't tried 11x14 steel yet but Im guessing even that would fit. All in all its a functional budget rig. Thankfully not a airsoft gimmick. 7/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pug butter

customer_reviews.title: Velcro gave out after an hour or so
customer_reviews.text: Vest Velcro’s don’t hold after an hour of wear kinda sad. Overall couldn’t get a snug fit without it. Too good to be true
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Plate carrier
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is very well made. I slipped it on right out of the package, and then I took it off and put it back on front forward. lol It fits very well. I may have to take in the sides a bit, but it's easily adjustable, so no problem. There's enough molle and pockets to to whatever you need to do. The plate holders seem plenty big to me. I'll know in a few days for sure, when my plates get here.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Good carrier for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is holding level 4 plates currently and sides Will fit right as long as you take the time to adjust it. Fits big chest people like me should fit smaller frames as well. Easy to put on and remove. The weakest point is the stuching a lot of single stich that could come unraveled if you do to much low crawling. But for the price of some name brand carriers this one is better then none.
customer_reviews.author: Micah A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level carrier
customer_reviews.text: Good entry level plate carrier. If you are not gonna add plates I would highly recommend creating something to insert as to stiffin up the “floppy ness”, especially if you are gonna do the classic 6 magazine front carry. The corrugated plastic used for gas station light pole and crash pole advertisements works very well, use 2 or 3 layers and alternate the corrugation to give strength in all directions. Good luck out there friend and God bless! Also this is gonna max out for slack adjustment at a 40-42” waist with flat stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Robdrea

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: After reading a number of reviews and asking around, this plate carrier is by far the best quality vest I've come across in this price range. Right out of the box the first thing I noticed was how suprisingly sturdy and well-built it seemed. I've only been out once with it but it was plenty comfortable once I adjusted it to fit me. This should be a good fit for a wide range of body types and preferences since it is easily adjustable. Time will tell but the quality of the material suggests this is durable and long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Overall you get what you pay for. The shoulder straps are so stiff that the entire vest pulls itself upwards off my body, and I consider myself a very average built guy, however this vest hangs directly on my belt line. (Too low) I would recommend going in on a higher grade vest.
customer_reviews.author: Llocsird'o Ttam

customer_reviews.title: Great but PLEASE READ!!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great, I love it but there is ONE THING THAT BOTHERS ME a lot about it. I ordered the tan vest and instead it came in looking nothing as light as the tanned vest in the picture provided. Its a more darker tan and it bugs the hell out of me when i compare it to the one in the picture. Drives me crazy since its hard to find slings & etc to match the color.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice rig
customer_reviews.text: I'm an XL and this carrier easily fits me with room for adjustments. I purchased a double stack triple mag pouch for full-loaded AR mags, pistol mag pouch, sidearm holster, and hydration rig. Also, put in 11x14 ballistic plates and it handles the full load very comfortably. It is solidly made, very good quality for the money. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Would not order again or recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Would not have ordered if I had known, it was made in China. Cheep single stitch.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in time

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for big guys
customer_reviews.text: First of all I'm a big guy, 6'2 and 245lbs this thing is great, it fits comfortably fits 10x12 level 3 plates just fine, lots of room for gear and it's well made, thank you for not disappointing with this vest
customer_reviews.author: Ryan w.

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable that 5.11 - slightly better for XL body
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2" 280lb - the 5.11 plate carrier is a bit small for me - this one gets you closer to a fit if you are bigger. Unfortunately, it has very little padding and breathable material. It is a plate carrier - it looks like it will fit any plate size + side plates. I'm yet looking for one that is slightly bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the price. Yes there are more refined plate carriers out there but they carry a price tag that is much higher than this one. Internal hook and loop straps to hold the plates right where you want them. Matterial holds up well and does the stitching. Molle webbing is tight and holds well.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Moore

customer_reviews.title: Gooddeal
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat this for the price matter fact I don’t see why you would need anything more it has all the qualities of any vest carrier you Maybe want something that works better where the attachments and the side plate gear attach,that little combination or area is the only setback beyond that great just a little awkward,works fine for me for I’m a pretty good size fella it is definitely well-made ,lots of slots for gear attachment front and back, material well made, and the look is a Appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Joshua Carter

customer_reviews.title: But at your own discretion.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, like my other plate carrier I purchased on here, for an emergency backup until my main one is done being made. This was too big, and wasn’t a good fit for mobility for my size, 5’ 8”, 165lbs. The Velcro straps were kind of weak, and the material is questionable. But I. Plus just be an outlier.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAT MAN RECOMMENDED! 4XL-6XL
customer_reviews.text: Fat Man Approved. I wear a 4-5xl shirts and coats and this plate carrier fit me perfect right out of the box. Comes with fully adjustable waist band with molle on the outside and inner pouches for side plates or trauma pads. Plenty of molle on the front and back and has a pretty stout grab handle on the back. The adjustable shoulder straps and have plenty more adjustment so this will fit taller and larger people. Definitely recommending this to people.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Dave

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This works. It is a little small for me. 5’9” 195lbs. I wish it was larger. I can only carry 6 mags across the chest. I normally carry 8. I have to put two more pouches on the side. Overall a good carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The plate carrier was worth the price. The downside was the plate holder was fairly low and it let the plate shift.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Moreno

customer_reviews.title: its nice but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Glad i bought it but would probably not have if i tried it on 1st in a store doesn't quite fit me right
customer_reviews.author: Smokey808

customer_reviews.title: It is ok for the price, but needs to be tighter
customer_reviews.text: This vest is too large for a normal sized person to adjust it properly. I'm 6 feet tall and 170 pounds and the vest can't be adjusted tight enough without making alterations. It does hold the plates in fine, but it's uncomfortable because the cummerbund and shoulder straps need to tighten at least one more inch.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heavlin

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a durability and functionality
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second time buying this exact same brand and type of chest rig. Gave the first one away to a friend because i told myself i didnt want or needed it anymore. And now its just over a year later and i just missed having it. First, its a great deal if youre looking for simplicity, durability and functionality and second it just looks cool. I appreciate how i can adjust it to make it nice and snug so i can attach all of my molle accessories to it. Just a great vest for those with tactically inclined mindsets.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for I guess
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually rate items I buy cause I trust what I’m getting from the seller but one this one I had to. So with this item I don’t why the shoulder straps were not sowed in the correct spots or if I just got unlucky and go a bad one of the bunch. Kinda sucks but it’s kinda wearable, but not horrible to return it and wait forever for a new one. Just thought let you guys know and see not all of them are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Comfortable & it Fits
customer_reviews.text: I have bought some other plate carrier vest off of Amazon and returned them right away because they were nothing but trash. This GFIRE vest however is made well, Durable, adjustable, Comfortable & it Fits. It has the options for carrying front, back and side plates or whatever else you want to carry as well as a good sized admin pouch in the front. You also have the option to remove the cumber-bun. I had already purchased one a few months ago and I bought another for guard duty. Definitely the best made, comfortable, most affordable vest on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Not for small people.
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit size small. Medium and up only. If your a skinny person look for another Carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and versatility
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable to custom fit the wearer and enough room inside to accommodate large armor. Plenty of molle to allow for accessories and attachment of gear. All around a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SoreThumbs (Rob G)

customer_reviews.title: Great quality produce at amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: This tactical plate carrier is awesome! Amazing price, perfect fit and great quality. A little upset that they increased the price just because of the demand of guns and ammo. I really want the black one but don't know if I'll pay the higher price for it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosko

customer_reviews.title: Good vest
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest however it does fit a little big on me and i was hoping it would come with the quick release cable but it doesn't. But apart from that it's pretty good quality. Havent had any issues with it so far
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’m a slim guy so the straps around my stomach didn’t fit well at all. But after I took them out and tied them together a different way they fit perfect. Also holds plates snug
customer_reviews.author: Shane J.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is not for you if you are looking for airsoft chest rig this is the real deal for the price it is pretty nice. Im a bigger dude 6'4'' 350 and Im not barrel chested just a big guy all around and this thing is prefect! i have not had a chance to take it out for a test run but it seems like a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This plate holder is super good quality for the price! I compared it to my buddies $200 one and it's really close in quality I would definitely buy this again and do recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Abelin

customer_reviews.title: Right out of the box, GREAT value for the money
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this vest. VERY comfortable for a bear-sized man. GREAT features not mentioned in the description such as hydration line retention, velcro AND snap lower retention, adjustable nylon webbing waist strap under cummerbund. Seems to be quite well made. Time will tell about durability and its not been tested under full carry weight of fishing equipment, but it looks to be a great value at the pricepoint
customer_reviews.author: MrAstor

customer_reviews.title: Great vest to configure anyway you want.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tactical vest. I'm still configuring it and adding pouches. Only reason I gave it 4 stars for comfort is that I'm in Las Vegas and it's HOT here ... Not the vest's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cowper

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations ! !
customer_reviews.text: Great product, far exceeded expectation. Fits My oversize 11 x 14 steels like a glove. Well built and stitching is good quality. Definately worth purchasing it if you are looking for a plate carrier ! !
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Little

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this as a “weight vest” I put 2x 25lb Weider weights inside. One in front and one in back. I’m 6’4 400 pounds and it fits good I can run in it and do burpees
customer_reviews.author: Veronica V

customer_reviews.title: great buy. Will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: The #1 thing i like is how sturdy the carrier is. It holds my 10x12 and 6x6 plates comfortably. Its made to setup for ur line of duty or play tatics. The 2 things I'm not pleased with but fixable. Is the shoulder straps and the adjustment in the back part of the carrier. The adjustment is two pieces of elastic with string tied at the end. So no way to adjust it at the back for super tiny waist. Other then that great carrier. I'll be buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 6 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it is a generic product. My standard plates were not secure in the rig, as well as the side plates only hold 4X4 plates. I ended up selling is to someone and paying the money for a Testudo II.
customer_reviews.author: Chris b.

customer_reviews.title: Great for weighted exercise!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for CrossFit work outs and rucking. So far has been a great addition to my gear and has proved durable, easy to clean and comfortable (as comfortable as a beer with 20 extra points in it can be). Don’t know why you’d spend triple the money on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: GoTina

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly impressed by this; it’s extremely comfortable to wear, has plenty of adjustment points to make it fit great and it looks sharp. All Velcro points are tough and even take a little bit of force to open, which is very promising. Lots of versatility with attachments to make it work for you
customer_reviews.author: James K

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great vest for the price. My last vest cost over $200 and was nearly the same quality. Its a bit on the small side. Im 6'3 280 pounds. But still fits well enough. Im a security officer and it works good for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Arabela

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Garbage, ar500 plates fit too lose and the material is cheap , condor makes exact one but the AR500 fits perfectly and better material , wasted money on this one
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and craftsmanship for the price. Tons of room for plates and additions. I added this vest to my training, so I will be ready when the lizard people attack. #StayWoke
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great plate carrier for larger people
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" 300+ athletic/chubby (think NFL lineman), and this fits comfortably. I'm sure taller would be fine, but I'm probably near the largest upper body it will fit. Built to last, and molle/velcro attachment systems work perfectly. Holds my 11x14 III+ lightweight armor plates perfectly tight and still. Extremely satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Not for big boys.
customer_reviews.text: It's basically a medium size. Good load bearing vest, but it doesn't cover enough of an adult, male torso to be safe as body armor.
customer_reviews.author: jByrd

customer_reviews.title: High value product, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Hi quality construction and durable. Fit 10x12 plates front and back just fine. Made it through a run with the plates with the plates securely held in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Came pretty fast. It's very comfortable. I bought it because I don't like to carry my equipment on my belt. I'd recommend this to anyone who does Security for a living or if you're a member of law enforcement. The vest has plenty of space. You can attach a considerable amount of equipment to it.
customer_reviews.author: -M31-

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large individuals
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect for large plates of 11x14". However you can still use smaller plates as the inside pocket has adjustable straps. The quality is heavy and built to take come punishment. There has been some concern on the web about the plastic clips breaking? so far no issues, I adjust to fit and do not mess with plastic clips much . very happy with purchase and I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Great plate carrier for most people
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice plate carrier. The only complaint I have is in the carrier pouch, there isnt enough velco to hold the plates high enough. This can be compensated for with the shoulder straps, but only to a certain extent. I run 10x12 ceramic plates and they just seem to ride a little too low. Not critically low, but lower than i'd like. Other than that, for the money this is a great vest.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very adjustable in size. Great quality. Holds mag pouches nicely. Can't wait to get some plates for it.
customer_reviews.author: dillont

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Carrier showed up in amazingly short amount of time. Is comfortable and made of very durable materials.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis N Wright

customer_reviews.title: great plate holder
customer_reviews.text: nice plate holder for the money, I made my own plates and this is a very good holder since my plates are oversized
customer_reviews.author: sparky349

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: i run this for tactical calls for ems as well as for security. i was blown away by the quality of this item. any law enforcement or first repsonder in need of a vest should consider this. 100% blown away. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, feels sturdy. I'm a big dude(6'2"- 250), so the shoulder adj. is maxed out but it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Ladies and gentlemen if you are in security and you're looking for a plate Carrier tactical vest this is the one
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did buy it to compare with another one from a tactical website and I got at my door in 2 days after I ordered. the other brand was on backorder. Really happy how fast and price that I paid for, good quality material but need some improvements but nothing important. Im 5'10" and 150lb (skinny as hell) so the "side strap" was too long for me and I had to make some "adjustments to fit. But loved!!
customer_reviews.author: P_Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Great First Plate Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Great for it's price point. Carrier is easy to adjust and the hook and loop system is strong. The MOLLE sections are correctly spaced and worked with every pouch I added to it. I have 12" dummy plates in the front and back, no problems with fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Nice for all sizes.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is worth it. Has many options. They took a lot of things into consideration when designing this. Worked perfectly for me
customer_reviews.author: joseph maese

customer_reviews.title: Nice budget plate carrier
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well built plate carrier so far. It fits me well and seems to be pretty heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Mateusz Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The material is almost as rugged as my ShellBack unit. It’s comfortable and feels great. Holds large plates pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Lozano jr

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a costume but I would trust this to hold up for a while.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Great tactical vest. Very secure and looks very durable. Looking forward to using my my plates. Great delivery. Color is just what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: TNHunter

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good cost!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fit my side sapis from AR500, but my level 4 ceramics fit nicely! Cost effective plate carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Drizzy

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: added plates. Fits very well. Lots of velcro securely holding everything.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Feels durable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy, 6'5" and around 350 lbs. Super broad shoulders and chest, but it still fits really well and I really like it! Feels like durable material as well. Some fraying of some threads, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cousteau Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Very well built vest. I'm glad I went this route.
customer_reviews.author: Newly L.

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers don’t care about quality.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know what I expected buying a cheap carrier, but the shoulder straps weren’t even sewn evenly. The rig sits crooked and feels very flimsy. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gideon Lytle

customer_reviews.title: Love this plate carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vest so far! It came in, put my plates in and got it adjusted. It fits perfectly! Im 6'2" and 225 lbs. It's well made and holds my steel plates great (no movement at all) Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great vest for the value. I am using it to hold real armor 11x14 plates in the front and 10x12 in the front. Very durable and would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: abel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vest
customer_reviews.text: Using this vest with 10lb Rogue plates. Strictly using for crossfit workouts and surprisingly it has held up. Only thing I modified was the mini velcro straps that stick out on the shoulder pads. Cut those off since they kept scrapping into my shoulders. Other than that, this vest does exactly what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Vest
customer_reviews.text: As we Always said in the Marine Corps....IT DOES THE JOB.!!!!SEMPER FI PATRIOTS ♠♦♠ Nothin But Diamonds Baby!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Will give 5 star if it holds plates good
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is excellent. Will update when I get plates for it. Fit is good. Im 5'11"/170
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great Plate Carrier! Tough and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Great plate carrier for the price. Very Adjustable. First impression of quality is great looks and feels tough. Definitely a good first Plate carrier or to keep in your trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased. This vest is everything I wanted!! It’s well put together, lightweight and easy to use. Plates can be easily added and secured. Material is durable and of great quality. You wouldn’t go wrong with this vest!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Love

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great plate carrier for the price. Good value and fits 6x6 side plates and a 10x12 front and back plate. Get used to the shoulder straps after awhile. Good introductory pc.
customer_reviews.author: Two-Five USMC

customer_reviews.title: No Go for CDCR
customer_reviews.text: If you work for CDCR and are a male this isn’t for you. The chest plate is way to small and the vest inserts do NOT fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vest with plenty of space and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Strurdy and a great fit, is well made and the quality of the manufacturing and the material is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Cristopher Zelaya

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was going to the desert to practice shooting drills. He really liked the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: He absolutely loved it. It took him a bit to adjust, but he was excited the entire time
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Straps with sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: Material seems sturdy. I like that you can adjust the fit to your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Stalcup

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for price, good velcro good buttons, still construction. I am very satisfied with purchase, will be getting a few more
customer_reviews.author: gage williams

customer_reviews.title: Solid carrier so far
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for Airsoft. I'm a larger guy, 6'6" and wear a 2xl shirt. It has been very comfortable. I have dummy XL SAPI plates that fit nicely inside as well. For a cheaper plate carrier, this thing is working great for me and it seeming to hold up to what I put it through with Airsoft.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hadt

customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable vest. Very good for isosceles shooters. I'll use this vest on duty any day
customer_reviews.author: Kira Sanada

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Will be ordering another one soon!
customer_reviews.text: Products looks well made. Im 6'1" 230 lbs fits well with room to spare for a broader person. All in all looks and feels great even though the material is a bit stiff at the moment (NEW) im sure once used the material will soften up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Marybel

product_meta.title: GFIRE Tactical Vest Modular Vest Breathable Combat Training Vest Adjustable Lightweight
product_meta.description:
Description：
The Modular Tactical Vest was designed for modular attachments on all sides as well as for functionality and operator mobility. 

Specifications ：
-Emergency drag handle 
-Removable anti-slip padded shoulder pads with hook and loop guides 
-Adjustable shoulder straps 
-Hook and loop webbing 
-Heavyweight webbing for modular attachments 
-Front map pocket with snap, hook and loop closure 
- Side release buckles on shoulders and internal waist strap 
- Padded mesh interior lining 
-Adjustable cummerbund with pockets 
-Accepts up to 5.7" x 6.8"
-Easy access pockets 

Size： 
Medium - X-Large adjustable sizing

Color： Black, Tan, Green
feature_bullets: Tactical vest with emergency drag handle; removable anti-slip padded shoulder pads with hook and loop guides.
Adjustable shoulder straps; hook and loop webbing. Heavyweight webbing for modular attachments.
Its' Front map pocket with snap, hook and loop closure; side release buckles on shoulders and internal waist strap.
It Comes with padded mesh interior Lining; Adjustable cummerbund with pockets; medium - x-large adjustable sizing.

2-Year . If you have any problem with the tactical vest at all, Just contact us. We provide our customers with cost-effective high quality items and offer 2-year quality . Please contact us as we stand behind our products.
